modName: Ghosu - Dragonbone Knife Knuckles and Cutlass
summary: Adds Knife Knuckles and Cutlass to the game (type:dagger,sword), forge: Dragonbone, Dawnguard required
descriptionHtml:
[center]I've quit modding and moved on to social work and game programming.
As a final gift: [b] ALL MY ASSETS ARE FREE TO USE[/b]
For further details and constraints, please check out the board thread:
[url=http://forums.nexusmods.com/index.php?/topic/1779275-time-to-say-good-bye-and-a-little-gift/]http://forums.nexusmods.com/index.php?/topic/1779275-time-to-say-good-bye-and-a-little-gift[/url]
Cheerio and keep on playing![/center]

[center][b]Dragonbone Knife Knuckles and Cutlass[/b]


[youtube]uhpUXP71LE8[/youtube]


Adds Knife Knuckles and Cutlass to the game (type:dagger,sword), smithing category: Dragonbone, Dawnguard required

[img]http://666kb.com/i/ck3spyyfzv2afsup7.jpg[/img]
User requested mod based on concept by [url=http://forums.nexusmods.com/index.php?/user/8196292-bretonhunter/]Bretonhunter[/url][/center]
author: Ghosu
